name: MetadataRenamer
description: MetadataRenamer renames series, season, and episode files when you identify a series in Jellyfin. Format: {SeriesName} ({Year}) [{provider}-{id}]. Matches directory to metadata exactly (per-season episode counts, position by episode order). Keeps episodes in correct season folders for anime/long-running shows. Dry-run, collision checks, per-item cooldown.

versions.changelog: Metadata-first: season/episode and target folder from metadata; skip when already in correct folder and correctly named. Per-folder stable mapping; per-season counts from metadata. Move to correct season folder; rename format and title only.

Metadata-first: season/episode and target folder from metadata; skip when already in correct folder and correctly named. Per-folder stable mapping; per-season counts from metadata. Move to correct season folder; rename format and title only.

overview: Renames series, season, and episode files; matches directory to metadata per-season counts and episode order.
